en.removeComment: To remove this comment click here
en.thanksConfirmEmail: Thank you for confirming your AtomJump Messages email address.
en.invalidEmailCode: Sorry that is not a valid code.

welcomeEmail.title: AtomJump Messaging Welcome
welcomeEmail.pleaseClick:
Hello,

Welcome to AtomJump Messaging. To confirm your email address is valid, please click the following link:
welcomeEmail.confirm: You will have 1 day in which to confirm this.
welcomeEmail.setupSMS: We would recommend installing the 'AtomJump Messaging' app on your phone to get instant notifications of new messages, and enter shortcuts. You can log out of here to switch off notifications at any time, and notifications will go to your email instead.
welcomeEmail.questions: If you have any questions or suggestions, you're welcome to get in touch via our main messaging button at https://atomjump.com

en.replyOrChat: Reply to this email, or chat live with this person:
en.deactivatedCheck: AtomJump Message was deactivated. ID: MSG_ID. If this looks unlikely, you might want to log into the AtomJump Messaging db to check it.
en.successDeactivating: You have deactivated the AtomJump Message successfully.
en.failureDeactivating: Sorry we could not deactivate the AtomJump Message. Please contact the system admin.
en.passwordNotReset: Sorry, that link has not reset your password. Please try again, and ensure you use the same device and browser.
en.passwordBeenResetApp: Your password has been reset, please return to your app, and enter a new password.
en.emailNotExist: Sorry, that email does not exist.

pass.title: AtomJump Messaging password reset
pass.pleaseClick: Please click the following link to clear your password:
pass.checkAndClick: Check your email and click the link provided there.
pass.pleaseEnterEmail: Please enter your email above. Then click here.

en.description: Open messaging that works, with live chat, public & private posts across any mobile or desktop device. Download the server and write your own plugins.
en.keywords: Messaging, Live Chat, Customer Chat, Open Source Messaging
en.goingFullscreen: The SeeTalent streaming page is about to go full-screen.  Please confirm.
en.cannotVerifyForPayment: Sorry, this user did not log in when posting the link, therefore we cannot verify them and allow you to make a payment.
en.logoutLink: Logout
en.yourEmailReason: Enter your email to subscribe to messages from this forum.
en.problemUnsubscribing: Sorry there was a problem unsubscribing. Please try again.
en.problemSubscribing: Sorry there was a problem subscribing. Please try again.
en.yourPasswordReason: We use this to provide security if you require private messages. Enter this, and click login.
en.yourMobileReason: We use this to text you if you receive messages on this messaging forum. Note the cost is 16c per message.  We bill on a monthly basis.  Please include your full country code eg. 4412345678
en.privateOwnersReason: A list of the users who subscribe, separated by commas.
en.privateOwnersReasonExtended: A list of the user's email addresses who subscribe, separated by commas eg. hello@atomjump.com,info@atomjump.com. After entering you will see E.g. 92.27.10.17:62,92.27.10.17:7, which are the user's ids
en.limitSubscribersReason: A webdomain that limits who can subscribe to this forum.
en.limitSubscribersReasonExtended: A webdomain that limits who can subscribe to this forum. E.g. 'atomjump.com', would allow peter@atomjump.com, paul@atomjump.com and mary@atomjump.com
en.tip:
Important: Any identity changes on this page will be stored in your browser cookies. See our Privacy Policy.

Tip: Click a person's name to talk privately to them.
en.getYourOwn: Get your own AtomJump Messaging widget.
en.videoSupportedPlatforms: Supported platforms: Android, iPhone, iPad, Chrome, Firefox, Opera, Safari, Edge
en.setForumPassReason: This forum's password, which ensure only private access for people who know the password.
en.setForumPassReasonExtended: This forum's password, which ensure only private access for people who know the password
en.setForumTitleReason: This forum's title, which appears at the top of the popup box.

photos.largeWarning: Warning: This is a large file, we will reduce the quality slightly.
photos.selectError: Error: Sorry, we cannot select that file. Please try refreshing your page.
photos.browserNoSupport: Sorry, this browser does not support image uploads.

en.tooManyConcurrentUsers: Sorry, there are too many people trying to use this forum at once. Please come back and try again later.
